text: (Tumhi) sanga, he lokanno! Jara tumhi majhya dina- dharmavisayi sansayagrasta asala tara mi tya daivatanci upasana karita nahi, jyanci tumhi allahala soduna bhakti- aradhana karatata, parantu ho, tya allahaci upasana karato jo tumaca prana bahera kadhato ani mala adesa dila gela ahe ki mi imana rakhanaryampaiki rahave
